mission.title: Why Moha Exists: Dignity Through Protection
mission.intro: Moha Insurance was founded with a simple but powerful mission: make insurance accessible to every Tanzanian, regardless of income or background.
mission.problem: Too many hardworking families — boda boda riders, mama ntilie, small business owners — go without protection because traditional insurance is too expensive or complicated. We changed that.
mission.vision: Our CEO started Moha after witnessing how a single unexpected event could devastate a family's finances. His vision: affordable, simple, and trustworthy insurance that empowers everyday Tanzanians.

impact.title: Beyond Insurance: Creating Opportunity
impact.description: Moha doesn't just protect families — we create jobs, empower communities, and invest in Tanzania's future. We're building a network of opportunity across every region.

employment.title: Work with Moha: Build Your Future While Helping Others
employment.description: We're not just an insurance company — we're a movement creating opportunities across Tanzania. Join us and be part of something bigger.

heslb.title: HESLB Loan Repayment Program
heslb.description: Join Moha and we'll help you pay off your HESLB student loans. Build your career while clearing your debt — a fresh start for graduates.

insurance.title: 13-Week Insurance Benefit
insurance.description: Pay a one-time interview fee and receive 13 weeks of life insurance coverage — protection from day one, whether you get the job or not.

jobs.title: 500+ Jobs Across Tanzania
jobs.description: From Dar es Salaam to Mwanza, Arusha to Mbeya — Moha is creating employment opportunities in every region. Be part of our growing family.

employment.footer: Join 500+ Moha employees building a better Tanzania

mission.title: Making Insurance Accessible to All
mission.intro: Moha was born from a simple observation: hardworking Tanzanians — boda boda riders, mama ntilie, small business owners — were being left behind by traditional insurance companies. High premiums, complex processes, and lack of trust kept millions unprotected.
mission.solution: By offering insurance for just 500 TSH per day, simple enrollment, and fast claims processing, we've made protection accessible to everyday Tanzanians.

hero.title: We're Here When You Need Us Most
hero.subtitle: Fast, reliable claims processing with payments within 5-7 days. Your family's protection is our promise.

howItWorks.title: How Claims Work
howItWorks.subtitle: Three simple steps to get your claim processed quickly

step1.title: Report Your Claim
step1.description: Notify us immediately via phone, email, or online form. Provide policy details and incident information.

step2.title: Submit Documents
step2.description: Upload required documents including police report, photos, medical records, or repair estimates.

step3.title: Claim Assessment & Payment
step3.description: Our team reviews your claim within 48 hours. Once approved, payment is processed within 5-7 business days.

emergency.title: Emergency Claims Hotline
emergency.description: For urgent claims or emergencies, contact us immediately 24/7

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about filing a claim

q1.question: How quickly will my claim be processed?
q1.answer: We process most claims within 48-72 hours of receiving complete documentation. Simple claims can be approved in as little as 24 hours. Complex claims may take up to 7-10 business days.

q2.question: What documents do I need to submit?
q2.answer: Required documents vary by claim type but typically include: policy certificate, claim form, police report (for theft/accident), medical records (for health claims), repair estimates, and photos of damage. Our team will guide you through specific requirements.

q3.question: Can I track my claim status?
q3.answer: Yes! You can track your claim status online through your customer portal or by calling our claims hotline. We also send SMS and email updates at each stage of the claims process.

hero.title: Speak Up Safely
hero.subtitle: Your voice matters. Report fraud, misconduct, or concerns confidentially. We protect whistleblowers and take action.

form.title: Submit Your Report
form.intro: Moho Insurance is committed to maintaining the highest standards of ethics and integrity. If you have witnessed or suspect any wrongdoing, fraud, or unethical behavior, please report it here. All reports are treated seriously and investigated thoroughly.
form.anonymous: Submit this report anonymously (optional contact information will not be collected)
form.contactInfo: Providing your contact information helps us follow up if needed. Your identity will remain confidential.

success.title: Thank You for Your Courage
success.message: Your report has been submitted securely and
success.assurance: We take all reports seriously and will investigate thoroughly while protecting your identity.
